#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
#include<cstdio>

using namespace std;

int main()
{

int t,i;
char str[101],ch;
int count;
//cout<<"enter the number of testcases";
cin>>t;

getchar();
while(t--)
{
	fgets(str,101,stdin);
	i=0;
	count=0;	
	while(str[i]!='\0')
	{
		if(str[i]=='A'||str[i]=='D'||str[i]=='P'||str[i]=='Q'||str[i]=='R'||str[i]=='O')
			count=count+1;
		else if(str[i]=='B')
			count=count+2;
		i++;
	}
	cout<<count<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
